title: Top selling Nintendo Switch games worldwide in 2019
summary: The Top selling Month in the Switch games was Month Super_Mario_Odyssey , who made 19.01 million .
The most selling Month was Pokémon:_Let's_Go_Pikachu!/_Pokémon:_Let's_Go_Eevee! , with just 3.13 million .

In second place was Month Super_Smash_Bros._Ultimate with 15.71 million ; third place went to Month Mario_Kart_8_Deluxe with 19.01 million ; fourth place went to Month The_Legend_of_Zelda:_Link's_Awakening with 3.13 million and fifth place went to Month The_Legend_of_Zelda:__Breath_of_the_Wild , who was 14.54 million .

data.Month: The Legend of Zelda:  Breath of the Wild
Pokémon: Let's Go Pikachu!/ Pokémon: Let's Go Eevee!
New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe
The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening

gold: This statistic shows the top selling Nintendo Switch titles worldwide as of September 2019 . With 19.01 million units sold , Mario Kart 8 Deluxe was the top selling Nintendo Switch game as of September 2019 .
